gate.composite.impl
Class AbstractCombiningMethod

java.lang.Object
  gate.composite.impl.AbstractCombiningMethod
All Implemented Interfaces:
CombiningMethod, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CombineFromAnnotID, DefaultCombiningMethod
public abstract class AbstractCombiningMethod
extends Object
implements CombiningMethod

Abstract implementation of the combining method. Classes extending this class must use startDocument() before adding any content (i.e. addContent) and must finalizeDocument() at the end of all additions.

Author:
niraj
See Also:

Method Detail

startDocument

protected void startDocument(CompoundDocument containerDocument,
                             Set<String> annotationTypesToCopy)
                      throws CombiningMethodException
User must call this method to start a composite document

Parameters:
containerDocument - - instance of compound document that the new composite is going to become member of.
annotationTypesToCopy - - list of types of annotations to copy underlying the unit annotation. Supply null to copy all the annotations. Supply an empty set to copy nothing.
Throws:
CombiningMethodException
